summary: Rod Drew hunts for a missing girl and finds himself in a fight over a goldmine as well.
cast: John Wayne|Verna Hillie|Noah Beery|Noah Beery Jr.|Robert Frazer|Iris Lancaster|James A. Marcus|Eddie Parker|Earl Dwire|Artie Ortego|Tex Palmer
director: Director: Robert N. Bradbury (as Robert Bradbury)
title: El largo camino
